subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Wade Dubielewicz has led the Islanders to four straight must-win victories in the final six days of the regular season while filling in for starter Rick DiPietro.
snippet: Goaltender Wade Dubielewicz has led the Islanders to four straight must-win victories in the final six days of the regular season while filling in for starter Rick DiPietro.
